title: Introducing: Alex Hedley
content:
Dorset singer-songwriter Alex Hedley cut his teeth as the lead singer of the now disbanded Saturday Sun, and is now stepping out as a solo artist.

His four track debut EP released earlier this summer is a stirring mix of Ben Howard and Benjamin Francis Leftwich influenced folk-pop, centred around the emotionally poignant main track, One Day. Accompanied by a stunning animated video courtesy of Jeff Scherr, itâ€™s real heart-on-sleeves songwriting, and hopefully the sign of great things to come from Hedley. Check out One Day below.
